main event: A white, round object was observed moving at approximately 2,000 mph for 2 minutes in Muskogee, Oklahoma.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be traveling at an altitude of 1,000-2,000 feet.
The object appeared to be metallic and silvery-gray in color, with a pronounced domed top.
The object was observed to be traveling in a horizontal direction, from the northwest to the southeast.
The object was estimated to be approximately 30-40 feet in diameter.
The sighting was reported to the Air Force and investigated as part of Project Blue Book.
photographs: yes, the report includes a photograph
